channel.title: Promps on My New Hugo Site
channel.description: Recent content in Promps on My New Hugo Site

item.title: Example Page
item.description: Create New Content Navigate to the root of your Hugo project and use the hugo new command to create a file in the content/docs directory: <message role="system"> You are an expert summarizer and analyzer who can help me. </message> <message role="user"> `Generate a concise and coherent summary from the given Context. Condense the context into a well-written summary that captures the main ideas, key points, and insights presented in the context.
